description.narrative: IFC is proposing an equity investment in BVCF III, L.P. (the Fund), a private equity fund focusing on growth-stage Life Sciences and Healthcare companies in China. The Fund will make equity investments in early- and growth-stage companies in a range of sectors, including pharmaceuticals, biotechnology, traditional Chinese medicine (TCM), medical technology, healthcare services, and industrial and environmental biotechnology.

The Fund is expected to deliver strong development impact as it would: (i) help the companies it invests in grow faster and more sustainable, through hands-on managerial and operational involvement, than they would otherwise do; (ii) support the job creation of the fast-growing healthcare companies, including woman employment; (iii) help ensure implementation of best practice governance, including the IFC Environmental and Social (E&S) Standards, in the Fund's investee companies; and (iv) facilitate the transfer of important knowledge and skills to local entrepreneurs that will improve their competitiveness in the global marketplace.
